data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - TE3-1072
data.detailed_description:
The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.

Photo-realistic graphics / textures and geometry has been recreated as accurately as possible the characteristics and details of the locomotive.

The model is equipped with an original soundtrack and detail functionality.

Operating the Loco:

To use this locomotive once installed you can find the locomotive under the Trainz Tab when searching for "TE3".

This is a Russian locomotive and has English and Russian translations.

For guidance to use this locomotive in Realistic mode we recommend you watch the creators video instructions on this product page.

data.short_description: The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
